Class ApproachCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ApproachCircle
extends MovingImage
    The circle that appears around the beat to show the player what to click

    5/15/15
    Author:
    Alek Antic

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApproachCircle

        public ApproachCircle(java.lang.String filename,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int r,
                      java.awt.Color c)
        Creates a new approach circle
        Parameters:
        filename - the file path of the image to be used for the approach circle
        x - the x value of the approach circle
        y - the y value of the approach circle
        r - the radius of the approach circle
        c - the color of the approach circle

    • Method Detail

        public void act()
        how this ApproachCircle should act in one frame of time
        Postcondition:
        radius shrinks, circle stays in the same place relative to the center
